metadata.subject: Bible
Censorship
metadata.title: Condamnation du Nouveau Testament de Mons par nôtre Saint Pere le Pape Clement IX ..
metadata.creator: Catholic Church.Pope (1667-1669 : Clement IX)
Catholic Church. Pope (1667-1669 : Clement IX)
Catholic Church. Archdiocese of Paris (France). Archbishop (1662-1671 : Péréfixe de Beaumont)
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 2 no. 36
metadata.description: Concerns Le Maistre's translation, revised by Antoine Arnauld and other Port Royalists
Includes also the text of the two Ordonnances on the same subject issued by Hardouin de Beaumont de Péréfixe, Archbishop of Paris (18 Nov. 1667, and 20 Apr. 1668)
On verso of last leaf (blank) is a list in contemporary ms. of other similar condemnations
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined. Text extends off of the page edge.
